os.fullpath: Operating System :: Modern (Vendor-Supported) Desktop Operating Systems :: Linux

name: Linux efficiency scripts
short_description:
A project creating scripts to improve (any) linux distribution, all though we focus mainly on lightweight linux distro's. The scripts are intented to make the distro's lighter/faster (so more eco-efficient) as well as easier and simpler to operate (so more time-efficient, and economically-efficient).

The scripts can be made to run for example in sequence by just letting the user run a single first script (which in turn activates the other scripts; one-by-one). This method also allows the user to remove the scripts he doesn't need, and/or allows us to select different scripts depending on what linux distro the user has (some scripts are made for specific distros, whereas others can be used with any linux distro).
summary: A project creating scripts to improve computing efficiency
